name: Dropman
description:
You play as Lyric, a bopper with a special music player; the Dropman. Using the gravity defying powers of the Dropman and Lyric's tapes full of bangers you will navigate the dangerous streets of Retropolis to make your way to The Concert. 

Controls
  • Move - WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Jump - W, Up, Space
  • Change Tracks
    • 1 - Normal Track
    • 2 - Light Track
    • 3 - Heavy Track
  • Restart Level - Hold R for one second
Tracks and Effects

By playing different types of music through the Dropman Lyric is able to affect the gravity around themselves. 

  • Normal - No gravity change, average speed and jump height.
  • Light - Lighter gravity, slower movement speed, higher jump height.
  • Heavy - Heavy gravity, fastest movement speed on the ground, cannot jump, can break crates by running into them with some speed or falling onto them.

You will use and combine these tracks to navigate the levels. Keep in mind that you can maintain speed from one track to another so you can perform a long jump by gaining speed with Heavy and switching to another track to jump!
